section_1_text.eng:

section_2_text.eng:

section_3_text.eng:
ğŸ‘€ People often see things in different ways. 
ğŸ“ You may find that your family members see one thing as a NEED while you see it as a WANT. 
ğŸ’° Talk with your family about why you feel differently. This will help you to understand each other and can make decisions together about what to spend money on.
